hero.name: Jiuk Kim
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: I have a deep interest in the synergy born from connections between people and chose the path of engineering with a passion to create more happy moments. I value persistent challenges and continuous growth, aiming to be an applied engineer who converts data into actual business value using machine learning and cloud technologies centered around backend development.

ml.title: Machine Learning Engineering
items: Experience with machine learning lifecycle (data processing, training, monitoring, optimization) using MLflow and other tools
Experience implementing multi-agent network RAG using LangChain and LangGraph
Experience implementing MCP servers for external API integration and lightweight RAG systems
Experience implementing lightweight vector search systems using vector DB in high real-time processing environments
Experience with LLM fine-tuning using QLoRA and LLM model serving using vLLM, Triton

dev.title: Software Development
items: Experience leading individual or collaborative project development and winning multiple competitions
Capable of independent frontend development using React.js and Next.js
Capable of backend server development using FastAPI and Spring
Experience with schema design and database utilization using MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, GraphQL
Experience with Docker image management and service deployment using AWS (EC2, S3, etc.)

Project 2. Prompt performance evaluation agent, "There are no bad prompts in the world"

jobs.description: Work Areas: Node.js chapter, event-driven and GraphQL API experience, Admin improvement tasks
